title: Who’s Watching the Winter Olympics?
sub_head: Students discuss the low viewership of the 2022 Beijing games.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss the Winter Olympics. Next week we’ll ask, “Some states and cities are easing Covid mask mandates. Others are not. Has the demand for masking exceeded the need?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Feb. 22. The best responses will be published that night.
